description.english: Defeat Ra'Kzar once in any difficulty
Defeat Noctus once in any difficulty
Defeat Akhan once in any difficulty
Activate 50 unique tiles in Scorched Lands
Defeat Aranax once in any difficulty
Choose 50 Neutral Arcana Ability cards from Battle rewards
Choose 50 Neutral Elemental Ability cards from Battle rewards
Choose 50 Neutral Light Ability cards from Battle rewards
Defeat a Boss with only 1 Hero standing
Choose 50 Neutral Nature Ability cards from Battle rewards
Choose 50 Neutral Void Ability cards from Battle rewards
Reach Master 10 to unlock Arena mode
Obtain 6 Injuries or more on a Hero in the Arena
Spend 9999 Gold at the Quartermaster during an Arena run
Destroy 6 or more Corrupted enemies during an Arena run
Win an Arena run without receiving any Injury
Select 5 or more Fate cards during an Arena run
Win an Arena run with a total of 10 Injuries or more on your Heroes
Select 3 or more Hazardous Battles during an Arena run
Spend 9999 Gold or more on Perks during an Arena run
Spend 9999 Gold or more on Healing during an Arena run
